sections.heading: Certain
sections.text:
population counts involving state inmates must be used for apportionment of

congressional districts.

sections.heading: Governor
Requirements
sections.text:
for filing declaration of candidacy; nomination of major political party

candidates; placement of names of minor political party and independent

candidates on ballot; conduct of elections; application of general election

laws; exception.
